title: Natively compiled Quarkus cannot find the private key

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

I was trying to run quarkus natively compiled. But every time I try to run it an error related to the location of the private key happens. I don't really know why this is happening, because everything is set up properly. I already tried to add the key into the container with the docker "ADD" command, but then I can't even send requests to the service, it always returns 404 not found.


The error:

My application.properties: 
```
#MySQL
quarkus.datasource.db-kind=mysql
quarkus.datasource.devservices.port=3306
%test.quarkus.datasource.devservices.port=3307
quarkus.hibernate-orm.database.generation=drop-and-create
quarkus.datasource.username=orion
quarkus.datasource.password=orion
quarkus.datasource.reactive.url=mysql://localhost:3306/orion

#JWT Build

users.issuer = orion-users
# Configuration to sign the token
# smallrye.jwt.sign.key.location=privateKey.pem
smallrye.jwt.encrypt.key.location=publicKey.pem


# JWT validation
mp.jwt.verify.issuer = orion-users
# Configuration to sign the token
# mp.jwt.verify.publickey.location=publicKey.pem
mp.jwt.decrypt.key.location=privateKey.pem

# HTTPS
%prod.quarkus.ssl.native=true
%dev.quarkus.ssl.native=true
%prod.quarkus.http.insecure-requests=disabled
%prod.quarkus.http.host=0.0.0.0
%dev.quarkus.http.port=8080
%dev.quarkus.http.test-port=8081
quarkus.http.ssl-port=8443
quarkus.http.ssl.certificate.key-store-file=keystore.jks
quarkus.http.ssl.certificate.key-store-password=password

#CORS
%prod.quarkus.http.cors=true
%dev.quarkus.http.cors=true

#Swagger
%dev.quarkus.swagger-ui.always-include=true

#SMTP


%prod.quarkus.mailer.auth-methods=DIGEST-MD5 CRAM-SHA256 CRAM-SHA1 CRAM-MD5 PLAIN LOGIN
%prod.quarkus.mailer.from=devoriontest@education.com
%prod.quarkus.mailer.host=smtp.gmail.com
%prod.quarkus.mailer.port=465
%prod.quarkus.mailer.ssl=true
%prod.quarkus.mailer.username=devoriontest@gmail.com
%prod.quarkus.mailer.password=redacted
%prod.quarkus.mailer.mock=false
%dev.quarkus.mailer.auth-methods=DIGEST-MD5 CRAM-SHA256 CRAM-SHA1 CRAM-MD5 PLAIN LOGIN
%dev.quarkus.mailer.from=devoriontest@education.com
%dev.quarkus.mailer.host=smtp.gmail.com
%dev.quarkus.mailer.port=465
%dev.quarkus.mailer.ssl=true
%dev.quarkus.mailer.username=devoriontest@gmail.com
%dev.quarkus.mailer.password=redacted
%dev.quarkus.mailer.mock=false
%test.quarkus.mailer.mock=true

# Email validation
users.email.validation.url=http://localhost:8080/api/users/validateEmail

# Google Openid Provider
quarkus.oidc.enabled=false
quarkus.oidc.provider=GOOGLE
quarkus.oidc.client-id=redacted
quarkus.oidc.credentials.secret=redacted
quarkus.oidc.token.allow-opaque-token-introspection=true
```
